title: Nadine Mulkerrin jokes her baby has 'Kylie Jenner lips' after sending texts to pal Jennifer Metcalfe
text:
Hollyoaks star Nadine Mulkerrin has joked that her adorable newborn son has 'Kylie Jenner lips', after messaging her co-star for some parenting advice.

The actress, 26, who plays Cleo McQueen, announced her baby with fiancé Rory Douglas-Speed, 27, had arrived on Wednesday with the couple calling him Reggie.

In a series of funny posts made on Instagram on Thursday, the new mother shared a conversation with her co-star Jennifer Metcalfe after a long night with her bundle of joy.

New addition: Hollyoaks star Nadine Mulkerrin has joked that her adorable newborn son Reggie has 'Kylie Jenner lips'

Nadine wrote: 'Day 1 - smug motherf****r this is world most chilled well behaved silent sleepy content baby.

'Day 2 Will this ever end. Why won't you go back in your f*****g bed. I've tried tricking him like 18 times just wants to lie on my nipple in his throat sleeping. Cheers bud.'

Soap star Jennifer became a mother herself in 2017 after having baby boy Daye with her partner and ex-Geordie Shore star Greg Lake.

Friends: The new mother messaged her pal and co-star Jennifer Metcalfe about little Reggie late on Wednesday night, saying he didn't want to go back in his own bed after feeding

Mum and dad: The soap star joked that she was happy the 'long night' was coming to an end and shared a sweet snap of her fiancé Rory Douglas-Speed cradling their son

The only message on Nadine's WhatsApp that could be seen from supportive friend Jennifer was sent at 20.51 and read: 'Sending all my love'.

Nadine also shared a picture of her sweet son sleeping in a white and black baby-grow which was covered in animals.

She captioned the pictured: 'But this face and Kylie Jenner lips.'

Happiest day: Nadine and Rory announced their new arrival on Instagram on Wednesday

New mother: As well as announcing the baby's name, Nadine thanked the NHS for their help

Before giving her 405K followers another glimpse at her son, Nadine revealed that she was wide awake early in the morning with a Game Of Thrones reference.

In a fresh-faced selfie Nadine wrote: 'Knowing the tea trolley is coming soon and it's morning and i'm no longer in game of thrones ep "the long night".'

The actress announced baby Reggie had been born with a snap of her family in the delivery room on Wednesday.

Proud dad: Rory said his heart was 'bursting' as he celebrated the arrival of the couple's son

She wrote in the caption: 'Reggie Speed You're the coolest little dude we never knew we were missing in our lives! We love you so Much.

'Also Thank you to every incredible NHS worker we've come across at the womens. (Helen,Jordine,Amy,Amy) Your all walking angels. Thank you so much for making one of biggest moments of our lives so extra special with care.'

In the snap a besotted Nadine lies in a hospital bed as she cradles her baby boy for the first time, with a proud Rory looking on.

Bumping along: Nadine has been keeping fans up to date with her pregnancy journey

Sharing the same snap a minute later, Rory, who plays Joel Dexter, wrote: 'Welcome to the family wee Reggie Speed 15.8.19

'We love You man. So proud of Nadine, I didn't think I could love her anymore but my heart is bloody bursting! She was amazing throughout her labour, Women are seriously Superhuman x.'

Nadine confirmed her pregnancy when she was nearly five months along back in June, shortly before the British Soap Awards,

Cute: The couple announced the happy news they were expecting a baby with this sweet post

The pair, who have been an item since 2017, announced their exciting news via Instagram.

They shared a snap and captioned it: 'That's us three ready for the @thebritishsoapawards'.

The post was also shared on Hollyoaks' official Instagram account, captioning it: 'BEST. NEWS. EVER.'
description: The actress, 26, who plays Cleo McQueen, announced her baby  with fiancé Rory Douglas-Speed, 27, had arrived on Wednesday with the couple calling him Reggie.
